column2: Fear Itself: The Book of the Skull (2011) #1
column6: All the Red Skull's terrible secrets and plans are in the hands of his evil daughter, Sin, who's intent on outdoing her father... Now find out about the Skull's most-dangerous World War II mission, that he risked everything for...and how it's going to tear the Marvel Universe apart today.  FEAR ITSELF starts here...in the darkest secrets of the past!
column8: | editor:Tom Brevoort | writer:Ed Brubaker | penciller (cover):Marko Djurdjevic | penciller:Scot Eaton
